Jugl.Node

Instances of this class contain a DOM element and methods to process Jugl statements.  Create a new instance with the {Jugl.Node} constructor.

Summary
Jugl.Node
Instances of this class contain a DOM element and methods to process Jugl statements.
Properties
template
{Jugl.Template} The template that this node belongs to.
element
{DOMElement} The DOM element that this represents.
scope
{Object} Represents the scope for this node.
Functions
Jugl.Node
Create a new Jugl node.
clone
Create a deep clone of this node
getAttribute
Return an attribute from a node given a localName.
setAttribute
Set an attribute on this node.
removeAttributeNode
Remove an attribute from this node.
getChildNodes
Get a list of child nodes.
removeChildNodes
Remove all child nodes of this node
removeChild
Remove a child node from this one
removeSelf
Remove this node from its parent.
appendChild
Append a child node to this node
insertAfter
Insert a node immediately after this one.
insertBefore
Insert a node immediately before this one.
process
Process all attributes on this node
processChildNodes
Process all child nodes
Constants
CLASS_NAME
{String} Name of this class

Properties

template

{Jugl.Template} The template that this node belongs to.

element

{DOMElement} The DOM element that this represents.

scope

{Object} Represents the scope for this node.  Any defined values or repeat variables will become properties of this object.

Functions

Jugl.Node

Create a new Jugl node.

Parameters

template{Jugl.Template} The template that this node belongs to.
element{DOMElement} The DOM element that this node represents.

Return

{Jugl.Node} A new Jugl node.

clone

clone: function()

Create a deep clone of this node

Return

{Jugl.Node} A cloned copy of this node.

getAttribute

getAttribute: function(localName)

Return an attribute from a node given a localName.

Parameters

localName{String} The local name of the attribute

Return {Jugl.Attribute} The speficied attribute if it exists.  Returns false if the attribute exists but is not specified.  Returns null if the attribute doesn’t exist.

setAttribute

setAttribute: function(name,
value)

Set an attribute on this node.  Doesn’t currently support setting attributes with namespaces.

Parameters

name{String} Attribute name
value{String} Attribute value

removeAttributeNode

removeAttributeNode: function(attribute)

Remove an attribute from this node.

Parameters

attribute{Jugl.Attribute} The attribute to be removed

getChildNodes

getChildNodes: function()

Get a list of child nodes.

Return

{Array(Jugl.Node)} An array of Jugl.Node children

removeChildNodes

removeChildNodes: function()

Remove all child nodes of this node

removeChild

removeChild: function(node)

Remove a child node from this one

Parameters

node{Jugl.Node} The child to be removed

Return

{Jugl.Node} The removed node

removeSelf

removeSelf: function()

Remove this node from its parent.

appendChild

appendChild: function(node)

Append a child node to this node

Parameters

node{Jugl.Node} The node to be added to this one

insertAfter

insertAfter: function(node)

Insert a node immediately after this one.

Parameters

node{Jugl.Node} The node to be added as a sibling of this one

insertBefore

insertBefore: function(node)

Insert a node immediately before this one.

Parameters

node{Jugl.Node} The node to be added as a sibling of this one

process

process: function()

Process all attributes on this node

processChildNodes

processChildNodes: function()

Process all child nodes

{String} Name of this class
